ing: 1 (3 ounce) package ramen noodle pasta, crushed
des: "Crunchy ramen noodle salad with almonds in a vinaigrette.  Substitute cashews for variety."
ins: In large bowl, combine noodles, shredded cabbage, almonds, sunflower seeds and green onion.  In small bowl, combine oil, vinegar and sugar.  Toss dressing with salad just before serving.
